language.entry: On the day that should have been his In-Swearing, he seized the Outcast Blade, shattered the Sacred Helm, and burned the Codex in the Vigil's Holy Flame. He strode from Vigil Keep, forever solitary, following his private code to the last strict rune. Still a knight, yes...but a Rogue Knight. He answers only to himself.

After tending his mother through a lingering death, he offered himself as a novice to the Vigil Knights, never revealing his identity. For thirteen years he studied in his father's school, mastering the rigid code that declared his existence an abomination.

Sven is the bastard son of a Vigil Knight, born of a Pallid Meranth, raised in the Shadeshore Ruins. With his father executed for violating the Vigil Codex, and his mother shunned by her wild race, Sven believes that honor is to be found in no social order, but only in himself.
"Slave to no man. Servant to no code."

Stand tall, friend. We will prevail.
I swear, by my honor, we will make it.
"Do nothing which is of no use."
"A warrior without sword and gauntlet is no warrior at all."
"In refusing to retreat, one gains the strength of two men."
"Move quickly, and pass through a wall of iron."
"If one's sword is broken, he will strike with his hands."
"If one has no arms, he shall kill twenty with his teeth."
"Freedom is purchased not with gold, but steel."
"He who conquers himself is the mightiest warrior."
"A storm rages, destroys, and disperses. The eye remains."
Nothing a little salve can't fix.
A gauntlet worthy of a knight!
This will strike them to the core.
Proper equipment maintenence is essential for any knight.
Come. Let me show you the power of the Rogue Knight.
Allow me to give you some pointers.
Train with me and become strong!
An outcast and rebel, the Rogue Knight stands before us ready to offer his aid, if we will have him.
Despite his predilection for turning crimson while angry, he is quite insistent that he is the "Rogue" Knight.
There is only one Rogue Knight! Remove this imposter.
There is only one Rogue Knight! Remove this imposter.
The power of healing fills me.
I regret it came to this.
A knight does not make a mockery of battle.
I am not of the slaves that perish.
You think I will die so easily?
If you must fall, die a warrior's death!
I refuse to fall while any Vigil Knights yet live!
Live on and fight with me!
I'm not usually one for drink, but after recent events...
Get me something to remind me I yet live.
What a waste of time. I suppose I will try to enjoy it.
Gambling is hardly knightly... perhaps we could wager on a duel?
...I don't expect you have anyone like myself?
I do not seek anything so crude as *that*.
I shall recite my code. One thousand repetitions.
Temporary peace to gird myself for the coming battles.
Faith in organizations has burned me before...
I'll meditate in the pews, but don't expect me to pray.
I am not here for your crass redemption. This is merely to toughen my body.
Nothing you do here shall be as cruel as the Vigil Knights were.
No need for the theatrics. Get it over with.
If I wanted to leave, you couldn't stop me.
Just get me a piece of hide to bite.
This is one foe I cannot fight myself.
I thought the Ancients were bad, but this...
I see their faces again, their hatred and fear!
I have many regrets, but none that you shall exploit, monster!
How dare you use her face against me!
I'll kill the big one; don't hit the small one in the meantime!
This is not the end I seek!
YOU'RE NO BETTER THAN THE VIGIL KNIGHTS!
I die as I lived... alone.
SHE CALLS TO ME, AND I ANSWER!
Even I cannot stand against this!
My blade may be large, but it cannot deflect a blade to the back...
Stay back! I don't need help from the likes of you.
I know I am different from you all. I know how you judge.
One man... in a world of foes...
Cast your stones! I have faced worse.
I will crush you as I crushed the Vigil Knights!
I should have done it alone.
I broke the code... what do I stand for?
A rogue knight... and a lone knight.
Is life merely an infinite test?
I am a Meranth! I shall return to the sea!
Codes are for fools! No gods, no masters!
My honor compels me... to gloat.
I have not yet begun to fight!
By my lights, I can do better!
I owe nothing to codex or covenant.
Take heart, comrades. We shall prevail!
From a lowly birth in the Shadeshore ruins, who could ever guess I would fight among heroes?
It is an honor to fight beside you.
Take heart. We will survive this.
Blade in one hand, scepter in the other!
Feel my strength flow through you!
As I betrayed the Vigil Knights, so too will you betray me!
When I turn red I can't see the blood!
The pain makes me feel alive!
Why use the Black King Bar when I can handle anything?
Don't test me; my wrath has few bounds.
This sword is big enough for all of you!
Give me the provisions; my health is more important.
Why should I have to pay for what is mine?
I lost my parents to a worthless covenant... and now I lose myself.
What kind of useless knight feels fear?
Give me the farm so I can carry!
I need more support before I can fight!
Perhaps in ten minutes or so I'll be ready...
I can't be backstabbed if I'm behind you!
Better that I supervise you all and provide moral support.
Leaving me up front where I'll be in harm's way, hm? No.
This was always meant for me.
The Rogue Knight feels no pain!
Does my code compel me? Maybe.
Running would be worse than death anyway...
I've fought enough for one lifetime.
None of you are fit to stand on the frontlines!
Stay back there and enjoy the show.
I'm tired of fighting one versus four every fight.
Stop leaving the heavy lifting to me!
Are you trying to sacrifice me?
I've already been spotted by their wards.
Not without a Smoke of Deceit.
Using me as bait? No chance.
...Or I could go collect more gold...
I don't need your help to survive.
I'm sick of being controlled like a puppet!
I am a free man! Do not deign to command me!
I will never bow to another!
I'll take them all on myself!
You fools don't know when to press the attack!
What fool came up with this plan?
Let a knight show you how it's done!
My code compels me... to ignore you.
I have struggled so long, and for naught.
I see you there, puppeteering me! No more!
We cannot afford this rest. They will be upon us soon!
Our foes gather strength as we rest.
Lighting a fire when surrounded by monsters? Are you mad?
That one looks shifty... I'll have to keep an eye out tonight.
You will NOT touch my helm.
I can kill a man in ten ways while seated.
Each wound a testament to my indomitable will...
Back home, I used to spend my nights fighting Hellbears...
All of you be silent, or I will make you.
I'm not averse to beating one of you, if you continue to annoy me.
If you touch my sword I will put it through your skull.
Give me some extra rations. I need more energy to sustain myself.
Without me you would all perish.
I am not rewarded nearly enough for tolerating you all.
I should have continued fighting for the Ancients...
I thought myself above it all, but I am a mere mortal.
What have I to fight for?
Ah, the fountain regeneration buff will help!
Which lane will I go to next?
Let's push mid after I heal.
I'm a god! How can you kill a god?
I lay down my arms... give up the fight.
Run, comrades. I will sacrifice myself.
I'm farmed up, let me take the hits!
You should not have crossed me.
You call your self a knight? Tchuh.
I guess they let just anyone be a knight these days.
That one gives me such a headache.
I'm going to count to one. One.
Just let me deny you, you'll respawn!
Maybe if I bait them in...
Bloodletting helps me channel my rage!
The flesh is strong, as is my will!
Nobody else shall dictate how I perish.
The Vigil Codex forbade this, and so I rebel.
And then I crushed his skull like this!
Arrows in my eyes! Fear where my heart should be!
Retreat is surely death. Press onward!
How dare you seek to impugn my honor!
Bury me in the Shadeshore Ruins.
And miss out on the fight? Nonsense!
You can all leave. I'll handle it.
What point is there in leaving a battle without a scar?
Get me an invisibility rune first!
I can't leave till an Ancient falls!
I dread the next to come!
Are you allies or foes in disguse?!
I must fend for myself, it seems!
No loyalty. Thrown to the wolves!
Some assistance? Come to my aid? Useless.
Why are you here if you're not going to help me?
The pain only drives me onwards!
We're going to lose the teamfight!
When did I agree to tank?
Am I outmatched? Is this all for naught?
I can't... I can't be failing like this!
The Ancients are sending these vile things to hunt me!
Why is it always me against the world?
I haven't trained enough for this!
I need more items for this fight!
Their carry outfarmed me, I can't win!
Had I swung, they'd be dead.
Hah! Let me show you how it's done.
What a sorry sight that was!
Swing to kill, not to tickle!
They're still alive? Give up already.
KILL EVERY LAST ONE OF THEM!
Heh. What kind of knight are you?
Ahh, so that's how it is then...
Are you hoping they'll let you change teams?
How much gold did they give you to betray us?
Would you like to hit them BEFORE I grow old, please?
Good. I'll take the last hit.
Move aside. I shall duel this one.
One by one we shall fall...
There's no use fighting death itself.
Get back get back get back!
Let me protect you. Heh... hehe.
You deserve to die if you can't even handle a scratch.
This is not ideal farm distribution!
Buy me a mango with that gold! Now!
Conspiring with them to kill the half-human? Racist.
That was surely not even intended to hit you!
What did they offer you, traitor?
Neutral items. Neutral items. Neutral items.
Hmm, I'm getting tired of that merchant...
How about I just stay put and read from the Codex?
And set myself up to be backstabbed?
You'll run the moment I look away!
What does it matter where I choose to bleed?
A grand spot for a final stand.
The less I move, the easier it will be for them to stab me!
You dare tell a knight where to stand?
Touch me again and I'll behead you.
If I wanted your help, I'd ask!
I refuse to owe you a debt.
Dulling the pain dulls the senses.
No. This pain will make me stronger.
Why waste it? They've got me.
Delaying the inevitable is a waste of time.
Discretion is the better part of valor.
I've lost my appetite for battle...
Protect me, weaklings, so I may carry you!
My life matters more than yours! Shield me.
I tire of this. You take over.
I will end you if you block my path.
This seems like a good spot to die...
Time to go for a swim.
My sword is my best friend. I think I'll name him Swordy.
Please have salves, please have salves...
Give it to me. I need this most of all.
None of you are worthy of what this holds!
Maybe there's a trap in this - allow me to activate it.
Ye he he he he he he!
Don't give me another Ballista, I swear...
This was always meant for me.
Give whoever made that a commendation.
I could've avoided that if I tried. Bah.
Those damned Techies must be around...
While I follow a code, I know *you* do not.
I won't take any chances on strange medicines.
You could easily mean me harm, couldn't you?
I'm fine. You hear me? FINE.
I'll go it alone. Always have, always will.
Stitch yourself up. I stand tall!
I'll die or I won't. Begone.
I'm sure another deserves it more.
Only the fountain itself will suffice.
Just give me your damn bottle.
I'm not gullible enough to rely on your methods.
Many allies have tried to get me killed. You're not the first.
I've had my fill of incompetent support.
I can take it! Don't get in my way!
Punishment I've earned. It's my due!
I'll survive the next one. And the next after!
Sod off with that pointless drivel.
Enough talk. I'm tired of hollow words.
Quiet. You're only making things worse.
Last time a teammate tried to "help" I got stuck on a cliff!
If you want to help buy a Vlad's!
Too much noise. We'll give ourselves away.
No time. We're in mortal danger.
I've got to keep watch, quit distracting me.
You think I'm foolish? No, save yourself.
You've got a look in your eye that I don't like.
You stay there. I stay here. Better that way.
Agony only amounts to more glory!
Suffer a little. Does you good!
Appreciate your wounds, they're proof of service.
My vows say nothing of charity to wastrels.
Think you have it rough? You know nothing.
I've got bigger things to worry about than you.
Haven't the energy nor the inclination.
Time wears us down. The road uses us up.
Don't feel like it. Don't feel like anything.
Eh, wasting time on this won't boost my GPM.
We could be out looking for a gank instead of this.
Stay well away from me. Don't like the look of you.
Can't trust you. It's not personal.
I can shrug it off. It's fine.
Quit treating me like an invalid!
What do you care if I bleed out or not?!
Don't touch the armor. You'll regret it.
Any closer and you'll be snacking on steel.
It's too much. It's all too much...
I disabled help a while ago, stop trying.
Give me a scepter and make me a king; otherwise, begone.
I'm likely to choke on it.
I've grown fond of the gnaw of hunger.
A meal? You spoil me. Keep it.
All food looks like soot and ash.
The hollow of hunger suits me.
No thank you, I'll have a tree instead.
Such awful service, where are my mangoes?
Bananas are good for one's intelligence.
Very well. If I die, I die free.
Sven. Desecrator of the Vigil Codex that had doomed his father. He answers to no one but himself.

On the day that should have been his In-Swearing, he seized the Outcast Blade, shattered the Sacred Helm, and burned the Codex in the Vigil's Holy Flame. He strode from Vigil Keep, forever solitary, following his private code to the last strict rune. Still a knight, yes...but a Rogue Knight. He answers only to himself.

After tending his mother through a lingering death, he offered himself as a novice to the Vigil Knights, never revealing his identity. For thirteen years he studied in his father's school, mastering the rigid code that declared his existence an abomination.

Sven is the bastard son of a Vigil Knight, born of a Pallid Meranth, raised in the Shadeshore Ruins. With his father executed for violating the Vigil Codex, and his mother shunned by her wild race, Sven believes that honor is to be found in no social order, but only in himself.
"Slave to no man. Servant to no code."

Sven. Desecrator of the Vigil Codex that had doomed his father. He answers to no one but himself.

On the day that should have been his In-Swearing, he seized the Outcast Blade, shattered the Sacred Helm, and burned the Codex in the Vigil's Holy Flame. He strode from Vigil Keep, forever solitary, following his private code to the last strict rune. Still a knight, yes...but a Rogue Knight. He answers only to himself.

After tending his mother through a lingering death, he offered himself as a novice to the Vigil Knights, never revealing his identity. For thirteen years he studied in his father's school, mastering the rigid code that declared his existence an abomination.

Sven is the bastard son of a Vigil Knight, born of a Pallid Meranth, raised in the Shadeshore Ruins. With his father executed for violating the Vigil Codex, and his mother shunned by her wild race, Sven believes that honor is to be found in no social order, but only in himself.
"Slave to no man. Servant to no code."

Podem sair, todos vocs. Eu cuido disso.

No posso sair at que um Ancio caia!

Vocs so aliados ou inimigos disfarados?!
Eu devo me defender, pelo visto!

Por que est aqui se no vai me ajudar?
A dor s me leva adiante!
Minha barra de vida est se esgotando!

Estou superado? Tudo isso por nada?
No posso... Eu no posso estar falhando dessa maneira!
Os Ancies esto enviando estas coisas vis para me caar!
Por que sou sempre eu contra o mundo?
Eu no treinei o suficiente para isso!
Coloque um pouco de esforo nisso!
Preciso de mais itens para essa luta!
O carregador deles est mais forte que eu, no posso vencer!
Tivesse eu brandido, eles estariam mortos.
Hah! Deixe-me mostr-lo como se feito.
Branda para matar, no para beliscar!
Eles ainda esto vivos? Desistam logo.
Heh. Que tipo de cavaleiro voc?
Voc est na esperana que deixaro voc mudar de time?
Quanto ouro lhe deram para nos trair?
Voc poderia acert-los ANTES de eu envelhecer, por favor?
Bom. Eu pegarei o ltimo golpe.
No adianta lutar contra a morte em si.
Voc merece morrer se no consegue aguentar nem mesmo um arranho.
Esta no uma distribuio de farm ideal!
Compre-me uma manga com esse ouro! Agora!
Conspirando com eles para abater o meio-humano? Racista.
Certamente isso no tinha a inteno de acertar em voc!
O que eles te ofereceram, traidor?
Itens neutros. Itens neutros. Itens neutros.
Hmm, estou me cansando daquele mercador...
Que tal eu ficar plantado e ler do Cdice?
E me deixar ser apunhalado pelas costas?
Vocs vo correr no momento em que eu desviar o olhar!
De que importa onde eu escolho para sangrar?
Um grandioso ponto para uma posio final.
Quanto menos eu me mover, mais fcil ficar para que me apunhalem!
Voc se atreve dizer um cavaleiro onde ficar?
Me toque novamente e eu decapitarei voc.
O que so essas tticas inteis?
Se eu quisesse sua ajuda, eu pediria!
Eu me recuso a dever-lhe uma dvida.
Entorpecer a dor entorpece os sentidos.
No. Esta dor me far mais forte.
Por que desperdiar? Eles me pegaram.
Atrasar o inevitvel uma perda de tempo.
Discrio a melhor parte do valor.
Talvez s um passo para trs...
Eu perdi meu apetite por batalha...
Eles esto se esgueirando sobre mim!
Protejam-me,fracotes, para que eu carregue vocs!
Minha vida importa mais que as suas! Protejam-me.
Acabarei com voc se bloquear meu caminho.
Este parece um bom lugar para morrer...
Minha espada minha melhor amiga. Acho que vou cham-la de Espadinha.
Por favor, tenha pomadas, por favor, tenha pomadas...
S uma vez, por favor, boa sorte...
D para mim. Eu preciso disso mais que tudo.
Nenhum de vocs merecedor do que isso mantm!
Talvez haja uma armadilha nisso - permita-me ativ-la.
Ye he he he he he he!
No me d outra Balista, eu juro...
Bala Greevil vai servir muito bem.
D quem foi que tenha feito isso um elogio.
Eu poderia ter evitado isso se tentasse. Bah.
Aqueles malditos Techies devem estar por aqui...
Enquanto eu sigo um cdigo, eu sei que *voc* no.
No vou me arriscar com remdios estranhos.
Voc poderia facilmente me fazer mal, no poderia?
Estou bem. Est me ouvindo? BEM.
Eu vou ir sozinho. Sempre fui, sempre irei.
Costure seus pontos. Eu me mantenho firme!
Eu morrerei ou no morrerei. Suma.
Estou certo que outro merea mais.
Apenas a fonte em si ser suficiente.
S me d a sua maldita garrafa.
No sou ingnuo o suficiente para depender de seus mtodos.
Muitos aliados tentaram me matar. Voc no o primeiro.
J tive o suficiente de suporte incompetente.
Eu posso aguentar! No entre no meu caminho!
Punio que ganhei. a minha dvida!
Eu sobreviverei ao prximo. E ao prximo!
Cai fora com essa bobagem intil.
Chega de conversa. Estou cansado de palavras vazias.
Quieto. Voc s est tornando as coisas piores.
A ltima vez que um colega de equipe tentou "ajudar", fiquei preso em um penhasco!
Se quiser ajudar, compre uma Vlad!
Sem tempo. Estamos em perigo mortal.
Eu tenho que manter a viglia, pare de me distrair.
Voc pensa que sou tolo? No, salve a si.
Voc tem um olhar no rosto do qual eu no gosto.
Voc fica aqui. Eu fico aqui. Melhor assim.
Sofra um pouco. Te faz bem!
Aprecie suas feridas, elas so provas de servio.
Meus votos no dizem nada de caridade aos imprestveis.
Est achando difcil? No sabe de nada.
Tenho coisas maiores s quais me preocupar alm de voc.
No tenho a energia nem a inclinao.
O tempo nos desgasta. A estrada nos usa.
No estou afim de faz-lo. No estou afim de nada.
Eh, perder tempo com isso no aumentar o meu OPM.
Ns poderamos estar procurando um gank ao invs disso.
Fique bem longe de mim. No gosto da sua aparncia.
Voc no vai chegar perto de mim.
No posso confiar em voc. No pessoal.
Eu posso ignorar. Est tudo bem.
Pare de me tratar como um invlido
Do que te importa se eu sangro ou no at a morte?!
No toque na armadura. Voc vai se arrepender.
Um pouco mais perto e voc estar lanchando ao.
Est sugerindo que eu *preciso* de ajuda?
Acha que isso ajudar? Est iludido.
Eu desabilitei a ajuda um tempo atrs, pare de tentar.
D-me um cetro e faa-me um rei; caso contrrio, desaparea.
provvel que eu engasgue com isso.
Eu me acostumei com o roer da fome.
Uma refeio? Voc me mima. Fique com ela.
Toda comida parece fuligem e cinzas.
O vazio da fome combina comigo.
No, obrigado, comerei uma rvore ao invs disso.
Que servio horrvel, onde esto minhas mangas?
Bananas so boas para a inteligncia.
Very well. If I die, I die free.
Sven. Profanador do Cdice da Viglia que condenou seu pai. Ele no responde ningum alm de si mesmo.
"A storm rages, destroys, and disperses. The eye remains."
. .Don't touch the armor. You'll regret it.
Very well. If I die, I die free.

On the day that should have been his In-Swearing, he seized the Outcast Blade, shattered the Sacred Helm, and burned the Codex in the Vigil's Holy Flame. He strode from Vigil Keep, forever solitary, following his private code to the last strict rune. Still a knight, yes...but a Rogue Knight. He answers only to himself.

After tending his mother through a lingering death, he offered himself as a novice to the Vigil Knights, never revealing his identity. For thirteen years he studied in his father's school, mastering the rigid code that declared his existence an abomination.

Sven is the bastard son of a Vigil Knight, born of a Pallid Meranth, raised in the Shadeshore Ruins. With his father executed for violating the Vigil Codex, and his mother shunned by her wild race, Sven believes that honor is to be found in no social order, but only in himself.
"Slave to no man. Servant to no code."

Stand tall, friend. We will prevail.
I swear, by my honor, we will make it.
"Do nothing which is of no use."
"A warrior without sword and gauntlet is no warrior at all."
"In refusing to retreat, one gains the strength of two men."
"Move quickly, and pass through a wall of iron."
"If one's sword is broken, he will strike with his hands."
"If one has no arms, he shall kill twenty with his teeth."
"Freedom is purchased not with gold, but steel."
"He who conquers himself is the mightiest warrior."
"A storm rages, destroys, and disperses. The eye remains."
Nothing a little salve can't fix.
A gauntlet worthy of a knight!
This will strike them to the core.
Proper equipment maintenence is essential for any knight.
Come. Let me show you the power of the Rogue Knight.
Allow me to give you some pointers.
Train with me and become strong!
An outcast and rebel, the Rogue Knight stands before us ready to offer his aid, if we will have him.
Despite his predilection for turning crimson while angry, he is quite insistent that he is the "Rogue" Knight.
There is only one Rogue Knight! Remove this imposter.
There is only one Rogue Knight! Remove this imposter.
The power of healing fills me.
I regret it came to this.
A knight does not make a mockery of battle.
I am not of the slaves that perish.
You think I will die so easily?
If you must fall, die a warrior's death!
I refuse to fall while any Vigil Knights yet live!
Live on and fight with me!
I'm not usually one for drink, but after recent events...
Get me something to remind me I yet live.
What a waste of time. I suppose I will try to enjoy it.
Gambling is hardly knightly... perhaps we could wager on a duel?
...I don't expect you have anyone like myself?
I do not seek anything so crude as *that*.
I shall recite my code. One thousand repetitions.
Temporary peace to gird myself for the coming battles.
Faith in organizations has burned me before...
I'll meditate in the pews, but don't expect me to pray.
I am not here for your crass redemption. This is merely to toughen my body.
Nothing you do here shall be as cruel as the Vigil Knights were.
No need for the theatrics. Get it over with.
If I wanted to leave, you couldn't stop me.
Just get me a piece of hide to bite.
This is one foe I cannot fight myself.
I thought the Ancients were bad, but this...
I see their faces again, their hatred and fear!
I have many regrets, but none that you shall exploit, monster!
How dare you use her face against me!
I'll kill the big one; don't hit the small one in the meantime!
This is not the end I seek!
YOU'RE NO BETTER THAN THE VIGIL KNIGHTS!
I die as I lived... alone.
SHE CALLS TO ME, AND I ANSWER!
Even I cannot stand against this!
My blade may be large, but it cannot deflect a blade to the back...
Stay back! I don't need help from the likes of you.
I know I am different from you all. I know how you judge.
One man... in a world of foes...
Cast your stones! I have faced worse.
I will crush you as I crushed the Vigil Knights!
I should have done it alone.
I broke the code... what do I stand for?
A rogue knight... and a lone knight.
Is life merely an infinite test?
I am a Meranth! I shall return to the sea!
Codes are for fools! No gods, no masters!
My honor compels me... to gloat.
I have not yet begun to fight!
By my lights, I can do better!
I owe nothing to codex or covenant.
Take heart, comrades. We shall prevail!
From a lowly birth in the Shadeshore ruins, who could ever guess I would fight among heroes?
It is an honor to fight beside you.
Take heart. We will survive this.
Blade in one hand, scepter in the other!
Feel my strength flow through you!
As I betrayed the Vigil Knights, so too will you betray me!
When I turn red I can't see the blood!
The pain makes me feel alive!
Why use the Black King Bar when I can handle anything?
Don't test me; my wrath has few bounds.
This sword is big enough for all of you!
Give me the provisions; my health is more important.
Why should I have to pay for what is mine?
I lost my parents to a worthless covenant... and now I lose myself.
What kind of useless knight feels fear?
Give me the farm so I can carry!
I need more support before I can fight!
Perhaps in ten minutes or so I'll be ready...
I can't be backstabbed if I'm behind you!
Better that I supervise you all and provide moral support.
Leaving me up front where I'll be in harm's way, hm? No.
This was always meant for me.
The Rogue Knight feels no pain!
Does my code compel me? Maybe.
Running would be worse than death anyway...
I've fought enough for one lifetime.
None of you are fit to stand on the frontlines!
Stay back there and enjoy the show.
I'm tired of fighting one versus four every fight.
Stop leaving the heavy lifting to me!
Are you trying to sacrifice me?
I've already been spotted by their wards.
Not without a Smoke of Deceit.
Using me as bait? No chance.
...Or I could go collect more gold...
I don't need your help to survive.
I'm sick of being controlled like a puppet!
I am a free man! Do not deign to command me!
I will never bow to another!
I'll take them all on myself!
You fools don't know when to press the attack!
What fool came up with this plan?
Let a knight show you how it's done!
My code compels me... to ignore you.
I have struggled so long, and for naught.
I see you there, puppeteering me! No more!
We cannot afford this rest. They will be upon us soon!
Our foes gather strength as we rest.
Lighting a fire when surrounded by monsters? Are you mad?
That one looks shifty... I'll have to keep an eye out tonight.
You will NOT touch my helm.
I can kill a man in ten ways while seated.
Each wound a testament to my indomitable will...
Back home, I used to spend my nights fighting Hellbears...
All of you be silent, or I will make you.
I'm not averse to beating one of you, if you continue to annoy me.
If you touch my sword I will put it through your skull.
Give me some extra rations. I need more energy to sustain myself.
Without me you would all perish.
I am not rewarded nearly enough for tolerating you all.
I should have continued fighting for the Ancients...
I thought myself above it all, but I am a mere mortal.
What have I to fight for?
Ah, the fountain regeneration buff will help!
Which lane will I go to next?
Let's push mid after I heal.
I'm a god! How can you kill a god?
I lay down my arms... give up the fight.
Run, comrades. I will sacrifice myself.
I'm farmed up, let me take the hits!
You should not have crossed me.
You call your self a knight? Tchuh.
I guess they let just anyone be a knight these days.
That one gives me such a headache.
I'm going to count to one. One.
Just let me deny you, you'll respawn!
Maybe if I bait them in...
Bloodletting helps me channel my rage!
The flesh is strong, as is my will!
Nobody else shall dictate how I perish.
The Vigil Codex forbade this, and so I rebel.
And then I crushed his skull like this!
Arrows in my eyes! Fear where my heart should be!
Retreat is surely death. Press onward!
How dare you seek to impugn my honor!
Bury me in the Shadeshore Ruins.
And miss out on the fight? Nonsense!
You can all leave. I'll handle it.
What point is there in leaving a battle without a scar?
Get me an invisibility rune first!
I can't leave till an Ancient falls!
I dread the next to come!
Are you allies or foes in disguse?!
I must fend for myself, it seems!
No loyalty. Thrown to the wolves!
Some assistance? Come to my aid? Useless.
Why are you here if you're not going to help me?
The pain only drives me onwards!
We're going to lose the teamfight!
When did I agree to tank?
Am I outmatched? Is this all for naught?
I can't... I can't be failing like this!
The Ancients are sending these vile things to hunt me!
Why is it always me against the world?
I haven't trained enough for this!
I need more items for this fight!
Their carry outfarmed me, I can't win!
Had I swung, they'd be dead.
Hah! Let me show you how it's done.
What a sorry sight that was!
Swing to kill, not to tickle!
They're still alive? Give up already.
KILL EVERY LAST ONE OF THEM!
Heh. What kind of knight are you?
Ahh, so that's how it is then...
Are you hoping they'll let you change teams?
How much gold did they give you to betray us?
Would you like to hit them BEFORE I grow old, please?
Good. I'll take the last hit.
Move aside. I shall duel this one.
One by one we shall fall...
There's no use fighting death itself.
Get back get back get back!
Let me protect you. Heh... hehe.
You deserve to die if you can't even handle a scratch.
This is not ideal farm distribution!
Buy me a mango with that gold! Now!
Conspiring with them to kill the half-human? Racist.
That was surely not even intended to hit you!
What did they offer you, traitor?
Neutral items. Neutral items. Neutral items.
Hmm, I'm getting tired of that merchant...
How about I just stay put and read from the Codex?
And set myself up to be backstabbed?
You'll run the moment I look away!
What does it matter where I choose to bleed?
A grand spot for a final stand.
The less I move, the easier it will be for them to stab me!
You dare tell a knight where to stand?
Touch me again and I'll behead you.
If I wanted your help, I'd ask!
I refuse to owe you a debt.
Dulling the pain dulls the senses.
No. This pain will make me stronger.
Why waste it? They've got me.
Delaying the inevitable is a waste of time.
Discretion is the better part of valor.
I've lost my appetite for battle...
Protect me, weaklings, so I may carry you!
My life matters more than yours! Shield me.
I tire of this. You take over.
I will end you if you block my path.
This seems like a good spot to die...
Time to go for a swim.
My sword is my best friend. I think I'll name him Swordy.
Please have salves, please have salves...
Give it to me. I need this most of all.
None of you are worthy of what this holds!
Maybe there's a trap in this - allow me to activate it.
Ye he he he he he he!
Don't give me another Ballista, I swear...
This was always meant for me.
Give whoever made that a commendation.
I could've avoided that if I tried. Bah.
Those damned Techies must be around...
While I follow a code, I know *you* do not.
I won't take any chances on strange medicines.
You could easily mean me harm, couldn't you?
I'm fine. You hear me? FINE.
I'll go it alone. Always have, always will.
Stitch yourself up. I stand tall!
I'll die or I won't. Begone.
I'm sure another deserves it more.
Only the fountain itself will suffice.
Just give me your damn bottle.
I'm not gullible enough to rely on your methods.
Many allies have tried to get me killed. You're not the first.
I've had my fill of incompetent support.
I can take it! Don't get in my way!
Punishment I've earned. It's my due!
I'll survive the next one. And the next after!
Sod off with that pointless drivel.
Enough talk. I'm tired of hollow words.
Quiet. You're only making things worse.
Last time a teammate tried to "help" I got stuck on a cliff!
If you want to help buy a Vlad's!
Too much noise. We'll give ourselves away.
No time. We're in mortal danger.
I've got to keep watch, quit distracting me.
You think I'm foolish? No, save yourself.
You've got a look in your eye that I don't like.
You stay there. I stay here. Better that way.
Agony only amounts to more glory!
Suffer a little. Does you good!
Appreciate your wounds, they're proof of service.
My vows say nothing of charity to wastrels.
Think you have it rough? You know nothing.
I've got bigger things to worry about than you.
Haven't the energy nor the inclination.
Time wears us down. The road uses us up.
Don't feel like it. Don't feel like anything.
Eh, wasting time on this won't boost my GPM.
We could be out looking for a gank instead of this.
Stay well away from me. Don't like the look of you.
Can't trust you. It's not personal.
I can shrug it off. It's fine.
Quit treating me like an invalid!
What do you care if I bleed out or not?!
Don't touch the armor. You'll regret it.
Any closer and you'll be snacking on steel.
It's too much. It's all too much...
I disabled help a while ago, stop trying.
Give me a scepter and make me a king; otherwise, begone.
I'm likely to choke on it.
I've grown fond of the gnaw of hunger.
A meal? You spoil me. Keep it.
All food looks like soot and ash.
The hollow of hunger suits me.
No thank you, I'll have a tree instead.
Such awful service, where are my mangoes?
Bananas are good for one's intelligence.
Very well. If I die, I die free.
Sven. Desecrator of the Vigil Codex that had doomed his father. He answers to no one but himself.

Nel giorno in cui avrebbe dovuto pronunciare il suo giuramento ha rubato la Lama del Reietto, distrutto il Sacro Elmo e bruciato il Codice nella Sacra Fiamma della Vigilanza. Si allontanato dal Forte Vigile, solitario, seguace del suo codice personale. Ancora un cavagliere, si... Ma un Cavagliere Rinnegato. Risponde solo a se stesso.

Dopo essersi preso cura della madre morente, si offerto come apprendista ai Cavaglieri Vigili, senza rivelare la sua identit. Per tredici anni ha studiato nella scuola di suo padre, diventando maestro del rigido codice che aveva dichiarato la sua stessa esistenza un abominio.

Sven il figlio illegittimo di un Cavagliere Vigile, nato da una Pallida Meranth e cresciuto nella Rovine di Shadeshore. Con lesecuzione di suo padre per violazione del codice e lesilio di sua madre da parte della sua stessa specie, Sven cap che lonore non va cercato in alcun ordine sociale, ma solo in se stesso.
"Schiavo di nessuno. Servitore di nessun Codice"

Il dolore mi render pi forte.
Perch perdere tempo? Mi hanno battuto.
Ritardare l'inevitabile uno spreco di tempo.
La discrezione la parte migliore dell'essere valorosi.
Ho perso la mia voglia di combattere...
Stanno cercando di prendermi di sorpresa!
Di sicuro non si aspetteranno questo!
Difendetemi, deboli, cos posso condurvi alla vittoria!
La mia vita vale pi della vostra! Fatemi da scudo.
Sono stanco. Prendete il mio posto.
Vi finir se oserete intralciare il mio cammino.
Questo sembra un luogo decente in cui morire...
La mia spada la mia migliore amica. Credo che la chiamer Spadina.
Datelo a me. Ne ho bisogno!
Nessuno di voi degno di questo oggetto!
Potrebbe esserci una trappola qui - permettetemi di attivarla.
Faccio io. Questo potrebbe far male.
Ye he he he he he he!
Greevil taffy sar di ottimo aiuto.
Questo colpo era destinato per me!
Date i miei complimenti a chiunque abbia costruito questo affare.
Bah.Avrei potuto evitarlo se ci avessi provato. Bah
Quei dannati Techies devono essere nelle vicinance.
Dannazione a te Dio della randomizzazione.
Chiaramente voi non seguite nessun codice...
Potreste star cercando di farmi del male, non credete?
Sto bene. Mi sentite? STO BENE.
Andr da solo. Come ho sempre fatto.
Chiudetevi le ferite. Io rimango a testa alta!
Di certo avrete cose migliori da fare che curarmi.
Morir o non morir. Lasciami in pace.
Sono sicuro che qualcun'altro ne abbia pi bisogno.
Non sono abbastanza ingegno per fidarmi dei vostri metodi.
Molti "alleati" hanno cercato di uccidermi. Voi non siete i primi.
Ho gi avuto abbastanza support scadenti.
Sopravviver al prossimo. Ed anche a quello dopo!
Basta parlare. Sono stanco delle vostre parole vuote.
Zitto. Stai soltanto peggiorando la situazione.
Scusa, ho mutato il comando di aiuto.
L'ultima volta che mi sono fatto aiutare da un compagno di sqaudra sono rimasto bloccato su un precipicio!
Se vuoi aiutarmi comprami un Vlad!
Non c' tempo. Siamo in pericolo di more.
Devo fare la guardia, smettetela di distrarmi.
Credete sia un rimbambito? Risparmiate il fiato.
Avete uno sguardo che non mi piace affatto.
Voi state l. Io rimango qua. Meglio cos.
Solo l'agonia pu portare alla gloria!
Soffrite un p. Fa bene all'animo!
Apprezzate le vostre ferite, sono prova del vostro valore.
Non vi siete meritati il mio aiuto.
Il mio giuramento non dice niente sull'aiutare degli scansafatiche.
Pensi che te la passi male? Non sai niente.
Ho cose pi importanti di cui preoccuparmi di te.
Non ho il tempo ne la voglia.
Non ne ho voglia. Non ho voglia di fare niente.
Sprecare il mio tempo cosi non migliorer il mio GPM/
Potremmo star pianificando un gank in questo momento.
Stammi lontano. Non mi piace il modo in cui mi osservi.
Non posso fidarmi. Niente di personale.
Smettetela di trattarmi come un invalido!
Cosa vi importa se muoio dissanguato o no?!
Non toccare la mia armatura. Te ne pentirai.
Un p pi vicino e avreste assaggiato il mio acciaio.
State insinuando che ho bisogno di aiuto?
Credi che quello sar di aiuto? Se un folle.
Ti ho gi mutato, smettila di provarci.
No grazie, ho gi sei item.
Datemi uno scettro e fatemi Re; altrimenti, levatevi di torno.
Sono diventato un amante dei crampi della fame.
Un pasto. No grazie. Tienilo te.
Mi piace la compagnia della fame.
No grazie, mi mangerei un albero piuttosto.
Le banane fanno bene alla mente.
Se devo morire, lo far da uomo libero.
Sven. Il profanatore del Codice che ha causato la morte di suo padre. Non risponde a nessuno tranne che a se stesso.
Very well. If I die, I die free.
Very well. If I die, I die free.

On the day that should have been his In-Swearing, he seized the Outcast Blade, shattered the Sacred Helm, and burned the Codex in the Vigil's Holy Flame. He strode from Vigil Keep, forever solitary, following his private code to the last strict rune. Still a knight, yes...but a Rogue Knight. He answers only to himself.

After tending his mother through a lingering death, he offered himself as a novice to the Vigil Knights, never revealing his identity. For thirteen years he studied in his father's school, mastering the rigid code that declared his existence an abomination.

Sven is the bastard son of a Vigil Knight, born of a Pallid Meranth, raised in the Shadeshore Ruins. With his father executed for violating the Vigil Codex, and his mother shunned by her wild race, Sven believes that honor is to be found in no social order, but only in himself.
"Slave to no man. Servant to no code."

Stand tall, friend. We will prevail.
I swear, by my honor, we will make it.
"Do nothing which is of no use."
"A warrior without sword and gauntlet is no warrior at all."
"In refusing to retreat, one gains the strength of two men."
"Move quickly, and pass through a wall of iron."
"If one's sword is broken, he will strike with his hands."
"If one has no arms, he shall kill twenty with his teeth."
"Freedom is purchased not with gold, but steel."
"He who conquers himself is the mightiest warrior."
"A storm rages, destroys, and disperses. The eye remains."
Nothing a little salve can't fix.
A gauntlet worthy of a knight!
This will strike them to the core.
Proper equipment maintenence is essential for any knight.
Come. Let me show you the power of the Rogue Knight.
Allow me to give you some pointers.
Train with me and become strong!
An outcast and rebel, the Rogue Knight stands before us ready to offer his aid, if we will have him.
Despite his predilection for turning crimson while angry, he is quite insistent that he is the "Rogue" Knight.
There is only one Rogue Knight! Remove this imposter.
There is only one Rogue Knight! Remove this imposter.
The power of healing fills me.
I regret it came to this.
A knight does not make a mockery of battle.
I am not of the slaves that perish.
You think I will die so easily?
If you must fall, die a warrior's death!
I refuse to fall while any Vigil Knights yet live!
Live on and fight with me!
I'm not usually one for drink, but after recent events...
Get me something to remind me I yet live.
What a waste of time. I suppose I will try to enjoy it.
Gambling is hardly knightly... perhaps we could wager on a duel?
...I don't expect you have anyone like myself?
I do not seek anything so crude as *that*.
I shall recite my code. One thousand repetitions.
Temporary peace to gird myself for the coming battles.
Faith in organizations has burned me before...
I'll meditate in the pews, but don't expect me to pray.
I am not here for your crass redemption. This is merely to toughen my body.
Nothing you do here shall be as cruel as the Vigil Knights were.
No need for the theatrics. Get it over with.
If I wanted to leave, you couldn't stop me.
Just get me a piece of hide to bite.
This is one foe I cannot fight myself.
I thought the Ancients were bad, but this...
I see their faces again, their hatred and fear!
I have many regrets, but none that you shall exploit, monster!
How dare you use her face against me!
I'll kill the big one; don't hit the small one in the meantime!
This is not the end I seek!
YOU'RE NO BETTER THAN THE VIGIL KNIGHTS!
I die as I lived... alone.
SHE CALLS TO ME, AND I ANSWER!
Even I cannot stand against this!
My blade may be large, but it cannot deflect a blade to the back...
Stay back! I don't need help from the likes of you.
I know I am different from you all. I know how you judge.
One man... in a world of foes...
Cast your stones! I have faced worse.
I will crush you as I crushed the Vigil Knights!
I should have done it alone.
I broke the code... what do I stand for?
A rogue knight... and a lone knight.
Is life merely an infinite test?
I am a Meranth! I shall return to the sea!
Codes are for fools! No gods, no masters!
My honor compels me... to gloat.
I have not yet begun to fight!
By my lights, I can do better!
I owe nothing to codex or covenant.
Take heart, comrades. We shall prevail!
From a lowly birth in the Shadeshore ruins, who could ever guess I would fight among heroes?
It is an honor to fight beside you.
Take heart. We will survive this.
Blade in one hand, scepter in the other!
Feel my strength flow through you!
As I betrayed the Vigil Knights, so too will you betray me!
When I turn red I can't see the blood!
The pain makes me feel alive!
Why use the Black King Bar when I can handle anything?
Don't test me; my wrath has few bounds.
This sword is big enough for all of you!
Give me the provisions; my health is more important.
Why should I have to pay for what is mine?
I lost my parents to a worthless covenant... and now I lose myself.
What kind of useless knight feels fear?
Give me the farm so I can carry!
I need more support before I can fight!
Perhaps in ten minutes or so I'll be ready...
I can't be backstabbed if I'm behind you!
Better that I supervise you all and provide moral support.
Leaving me up front where I'll be in harm's way, hm? No.
This was always meant for me.
The Rogue Knight feels no pain!
Does my code compel me? Maybe.
Running would be worse than death anyway...
I've fought enough for one lifetime.
None of you are fit to stand on the frontlines!
Stay back there and enjoy the show.
I'm tired of fighting one versus four every fight.
Stop leaving the heavy lifting to me!
Are you trying to sacrifice me?
I've already been spotted by their wards.
Not without a Smoke of Deceit.
Using me as bait? No chance.
...Or I could go collect more gold...
I don't need your help to survive.
I'm sick of being controlled like a puppet!
I am a free man! Do not deign to command me!
I will never bow to another!
I'll take them all on myself!
You fools don't know when to press the attack!
What fool came up with this plan?
Let a knight show you how it's done!
My code compels me... to ignore you.
I have struggled so long, and for naught.
I see you there, puppeteering me! No more!
We cannot afford this rest. They will be upon us soon!
Our foes gather strength as we rest.
Lighting a fire when surrounded by monsters? Are you mad?
That one looks shifty... I'll have to keep an eye out tonight.
You will NOT touch my helm.
I can kill a man in ten ways while seated.
Each wound a testament to my indomitable will...
Back home, I used to spend my nights fighting Hellbears...
All of you be silent, or I will make you.
I'm not averse to beating one of you, if you continue to annoy me.
If you touch my sword I will put it through your skull.
Give me some extra rations. I need more energy to sustain myself.
Without me you would all perish.
I am not rewarded nearly enough for tolerating you all.
I should have continued fighting for the Ancients...
I thought myself above it all, but I am a mere mortal.
What have I to fight for?
Ah, the fountain regeneration buff will help!
Which lane will I go to next?
Let's push mid after I heal.
I'm a god! How can you kill a god?
I lay down my arms... give up the fight.
Run, comrades. I will sacrifice myself.
I'm farmed up, let me take the hits!
You should not have crossed me.
You call your self a knight? Tchuh.
I guess they let just anyone be a knight these days.
That one gives me such a headache.
I'm going to count to one. One.
Just let me deny you, you'll respawn!
Maybe if I bait them in...
Bloodletting helps me channel my rage!
The flesh is strong, as is my will!
Nobody else shall dictate how I perish.
The Vigil Codex forbade this, and so I rebel.
And then I crushed his skull like this!
Arrows in my eyes! Fear where my heart should be!
Retreat is surely death. Press onward!
How dare you seek to impugn my honor!
Bury me in the Shadeshore Ruins.
And miss out on the fight? Nonsense!
You can all leave. I'll handle it.
What point is there in leaving a battle without a scar?
Get me an invisibility rune first!
I can't leave till an Ancient falls!
I dread the next to come!
Are you allies or foes in disguse?!
I must fend for myself, it seems!
No loyalty. Thrown to the wolves!
Some assistance? Come to my aid? Useless.
Why are you here if you're not going to help me?
The pain only drives me onwards!
We're going to lose the teamfight!
When did I agree to tank?
Am I outmatched? Is this all for naught?
I can't... I can't be failing like this!
The Ancients are sending these vile things to hunt me!
Why is it always me against the world?
I haven't trained enough for this!
I need more items for this fight!
Their carry outfarmed me, I can't win!
Had I swung, they'd be dead.
Hah! Let me show you how it's done.
What a sorry sight that was!
Swing to kill, not to tickle!
They're still alive? Give up already.
KILL EVERY LAST ONE OF THEM!
Heh. What kind of knight are you?
Ahh, so that's how it is then...
Are you hoping they'll let you change teams?
How much gold did they give you to betray us?
Would you like to hit them BEFORE I grow old, please?
Good. I'll take the last hit.
Move aside. I shall duel this one.
One by one we shall fall...
There's no use fighting death itself.
Get back get back get back!
Let me protect you. Heh... hehe.
You deserve to die if you can't even handle a scratch.
This is not ideal farm distribution!
Buy me a mango with that gold! Now!
Conspiring with them to kill the half-human? Racist.
That was surely not even intended to hit you!
What did they offer you, traitor?
Neutral items. Neutral items. Neutral items.
Hmm, I'm getting tired of that merchant...
How about I just stay put and read from the Codex?
And set myself up to be backstabbed?
You'll run the moment I look away!
What does it matter where I choose to bleed?
A grand spot for a final stand.
The less I move, the easier it will be for them to stab me!
You dare tell a knight where to stand?
Touch me again and I'll behead you.
If I wanted your help, I'd ask!
I refuse to owe you a debt.
Dulling the pain dulls the senses.
No. This pain will make me stronger.
Why waste it? They've got me.
Delaying the inevitable is a waste of time.
Discretion is the better part of valor.
I've lost my appetite for battle...
Protect me, weaklings, so I may carry you!
My life matters more than yours! Shield me.
I tire of this. You take over.
I will end you if you block my path.
This seems like a good spot to die...
Time to go for a swim.
My sword is my best friend. I think I'll name him Swordy.
Please have salves, please have salves...
Give it to me. I need this most of all.
None of you are worthy of what this holds!
Maybe there's a trap in this - allow me to activate it.
Ye he he he he he he!
Don't give me another Ballista, I swear...
This was always meant for me.
Give whoever made that a commendation.
I could've avoided that if I tried. Bah.
Those damned Techies must be around...
While I follow a code, I know *you* do not.
I won't take any chances on strange medicines.
You could easily mean me harm, couldn't you?
I'm fine. You hear me? FINE.
I'll go it alone. Always have, always will.
Stitch yourself up. I stand tall!
I'll die or I won't. Begone.
I'm sure another deserves it more.
Only the fountain itself will suffice.
Just give me your damn bottle.
I'm not gullible enough to rely on your methods.
Many allies have tried to get me killed. You're not the first.
I've had my fill of incompetent support.
I can take it! Don't get in my way!
Punishment I've earned. It's my due!
I'll survive the next one. And the next after!
Sod off with that pointless drivel.
Enough talk. I'm tired of hollow words.
Quiet. You're only making things worse.
Last time a teammate tried to "help" I got stuck on a cliff!
If you want to help buy a Vlad's!
Too much noise. We'll give ourselves away.
No time. We're in mortal danger.
I've got to keep watch, quit distracting me.
You think I'm foolish? No, save yourself.
You've got a look in your eye that I don't like.
You stay there. I stay here. Better that way.
Agony only amounts to more glory!
Suffer a little. Does you good!
Appreciate your wounds, they're proof of service.
My vows say nothing of charity to wastrels.
Think you have it rough? You know nothing.
I've got bigger things to worry about than you.
Haven't the energy nor the inclination.
Time wears us down. The road uses us up.
Don't feel like it. Don't feel like anything.
Eh, wasting time on this won't boost my GPM.
We could be out looking for a gank instead of this.
Stay well away from me. Don't like the look of you.
Can't trust you. It's not personal.
I can shrug it off. It's fine.
Quit treating me like an invalid!
What do you care if I bleed out or not?!
Don't touch the armor. You'll regret it.
Any closer and you'll be snacking on steel.
It's too much. It's all too much...
I disabled help a while ago, stop trying.
Give me a scepter and make me a king; otherwise, begone.
I'm likely to choke on it.
I've grown fond of the gnaw of hunger.
A meal? You spoil me. Keep it.
All food looks like soot and ash.
The hollow of hunger suits me.
No thank you, I'll have a tree instead.
Such awful service, where are my mangoes?
Bananas are good for one's intelligence.
Very well. If I die, I die free.
Sven. Desecrator of the Vigil Codex that had doomed his father. He answers to no one but himself.

Sven. Desecrator of the Vigil Codex that had doomed his father. He answers to no one but himself.

On the day that should have been his In-Swearing, he seized the Outcast Blade, shattered the Sacred Helm, and burned the Codex in the Vigil's Holy Flame. He strode from Vigil Keep, forever solitary, following his private code to the last strict rune. Still a knight, yes...but a Rogue Knight. He answers only to himself.

After tending his mother through a lingering death, he offered himself as a novice to the Vigil Knights, never revealing his identity. For thirteen years he studied in his father's school, mastering the rigid code that declared his existence an abomination.

Sven is the bastard son of a Vigil Knight, born of a Pallid Meranth, raised in the Shadeshore Ruins. With his father executed for violating the Vigil Codex, and his mother shunned by her wild race, Sven believes that honor is to be found in no social order, but only in himself.
"Slave to no man. Servant to no code."
